metadata.title: CVE-2019-12409 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The 8.1.1 and 8.2.0 releases of Apache Solr contain an insecure setting forthe ENABLE_REMOTE_JMX_OPTS configuration option in the default solr.in.shconfiguration file shipping with Solr. If you use the default solr.in.shfile from the affected releases, then JMX monitoring will be enabled andexposed on RMI_PORT (default=18983), without any authentication. If thisport is opened for inbound traffic in your firewall, then anyone withnetwork access to your Solr nodes will be able to access JMX, which may inturn allow them to upload malicious code for execution on the Solr server.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
